name: TuyaSmartBaseKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
  #import <TuyaSmartBaseKit/TuyaSmartBaseKit.h>
  #undef TYLog
  #undef TYSDKLogDebug
  #undef TYSDKLogInfo
  #undef TYSDKLogWarn
  #undef TYSDKLogError
  #define TYSDKLogDebug(...)         TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogInfo(...)         TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogWarn(...)         TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogError(...)         TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)

  #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
  #import "TYBaseNotificationUtils.h"

#endif
